author: artifact4727
body:
### Discussed in https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/discussions/15612
Originally posted by **artifact4727** June 19, 2021 Somewhere on the Internet I read that a .NET framework update could change the order of autocomplete. E.g, if you have the files: foo.bat foo_bar.bat foo_bar_foo.bat If you typed "foo "Tab key was stepping through them in descending order. Which makes sense IMHO because foo is a closer match to "foo.bat" than to "foo_bar_foo.bat". However, suddenly it started iterating backwards for me and I assume it has something to to with .NET framework as I wrote initially. Can you still, please check if this behavior is possible to fix within Powershell Core? I would be very thankful since it makes my life easier.
title: Tab Autocomplete not working as expected anymore
